knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

```


```{r}
# List all sheet names in the Excel file
sheet_names <- excel_sheets("data/2024_county_health_release_data_-_v1.xlsx")
print(sheet_names)


```


```{r}
health_measure_data <- read_excel("data/2024_county_health_release_data_-_v1.xlsx", sheet = "Select Measure Data")
health_additional_data <- read_excel("data/2024_county_health_release_data_-_v1.xlsx", sheet = "Additional Measure Data")
health_outcomes_factors <- read_excel("data/2024_county_health_release_data_-_v1.xlsx", sheet = "Health Outcomes & Factors")

```


```{r}
combined_data <- bind_rows(health_additional_data, health_measure_data, health_outcomes_factors)

# Save the combined data as a CSV file
write_csv(combined_data, "data/combined_health_data.csv")

```
